 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָתַךְ‎</span> **verb** ==pour forth== (intransitive), ==be poured out== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Niph\`al ***flow***, Hiph\`il ***melt*** (transitive); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***natâku***</u></abbr>, ***flow*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 487</sup> Jäger<sup>BAS ii. 292</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Aph\`el ***pour out***, especially ***melt***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליתכה‎</span> (Haph\`el) [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xlvii (1893), 98</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>83</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (rare) [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2480</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתַּךְ‎</span> [[Jer.42.18|Jer 42:18]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּתַּךְ‎</span> [[Jer.44.6|Jer 44:6]]; [[Dan.9.11|Dan 9:11]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְּכוּ‎</span> [[Job.3.34|Job 3:34]] — ***pour forth***, always figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַמַּיִם שַׁאֲגֹתָ֑י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִתּ‎</span> [[Job.3.24|Job 3:24]] ***and my groans have poured forth like water***; usually of divine wrath (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵמָה‎</span>) [[Jer.42.18|Jer 42:18]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> person), [[Jer.44.6|Jer 44:6]] (absolute), [[2Chr.12.7|2Chr 12:7]]; [[2Chr.34.25|2Chr 34:25]] (both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local ***against***); compare also [[Dan.9.11|Dan 9:11]] v[[Dan.9.27|Dan 9:27]] (both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> person) **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִתַּךְ‎</span> [[Exod.9.33|Exod 9:33]] + 2 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִתְּכָה‎</span> [[Nah.1.6|Nah 1:6]]; [[2Chr.34.21|2Chr 34:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִתְּכָה‎</span> consecutive [[Ezek.24.11|Ezek 24:11]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִתַּכְתֶּם‎</span> [[Ezek.22.21|Ezek 22:21]] ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִתֶּ֫בֶת‎</span> [[Jer.7.20|Jer 7:20]]: — ***be poured***, of rain, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָ֑רְצָה‎</span> [[Exod.9.33|Exod 9:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[2Sam.21.10|2Sam 21:10]] ***be poured out***, of wrath of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Nah.1.6|Nah 1:6]] (absolute), [[Jer.7.20|Jer 7:20]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> location), [[Jer.42.18|Jer 42:18]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> person), [[2Chr.34.21|2Chr 34:21]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person); ***be poured forth*** i.e. melted, annihilated in the midst of (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתוֺךְ‎</span>) the fire of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s fury [[Ezek.22.21|Ezek 22:21]] (subject persons), so [[Ezek.24.11|Ezek 24:11]] (subject impurity, figurative of caldron). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתִּיכוּ עֲבָדֶיךָ אֶתהַֿכֶּסֶף‎</span> [[2Kgs.22.9|2Kgs 22:9]] ***thy servants have poured out the money*** (\|\| [[2Chr.34.12|2Chr 34:12]] below); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתַּכְתִּ֫י אֶתְכֶם‎</span> consecutive [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] ***and I will, melt you*** (figurative of judgment); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַנְתִּיךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] ***in order to melt*** it (i.e. metal in furnace; [[BDB#Co|Co]] after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִנָּתֵךְ‎</span> **Niph\`al** ***Infinitive***, so [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]], compare Toy); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּתִּיכוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.34.17|2Chr 34:17]] (\|\| [[2Kgs.22.9|2Kgs 22:9]] above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲלֹא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶחָלָב תַּתִּיכֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.10.10|Job 10:10]] ***dost*** (= didst) ***thou not pour me out like milk?*** (of beginnings of life). **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּן תֻּתְּכוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.22|Ezek 22:22]] ***so shall ye be melted*** (figurative of judgement).
